Interface StarknetContextValue

interface StarknetContextValue {
    account: null | StarknetAccount;
    config: StarknetConfig;
    connect: ((walletId?: string) => Promise<void>);
    connector: null | WalletConnector;
    disconnect: (() => Promise<void>);
    error: null | StarknetSdkError;
    isConnected: boolean;
    isConnecting: boolean;
    provider: null | RpcProvider;
    sendTransaction: ((request: TransactionRequest) => Promise<TransactionResult>);
    signMessage: ((message: string) => Promise<string>);
}
